channel.title: ::pure
channel.description: can i get the command for ::pure for all players? thanks

item.title: ::pure
item.dc:creator: @Danielplanto Danielplanto
item.description:
@Danielplanto wrote:

All that command does is give instant 99 on those skills. Could someone please tell me how to make it temporary? I tried making it: (…s=what you should know)(max level per skill 150, lvl 150 exp 190m)

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure"){ public boolean pure = 0; if(pure == 0){ addSkillXP(95000000, 0) addSkillXP(95000000, 1) addSkillXP(95000000, 2) addSkillXP(95000000, 3) pure = 1; } if(pure == 1){ sM("You have already done pure!"); } }
However, It says Illegal Start of Expression at Public Boolean-- but i put it other places and it cant find pure. what can i do?

Read full topic

item.title: ::pure
item.dc:creator: @DivineSouls DivineSouls
item.description:
@DivineSouls wrote:

You didn’t post your source, so I’m taking a shot in the dark here by assuming you are using delta.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 0) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(0, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(0, 5); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); }

Read full topic
